item.title: Help me please with 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @FrozenLord FrozenLord
item.description:
@FrozenLord wrote:

hello everybody! ;D
i hope you guys will help me.
ok lets start

first of all client problem

when i want to log out from the server
i press “log out” button
and its not responding (just dont do nothing)

client download link: http://www.upload.ee/files/187010/The_Official_Rune-Warfare_Client.rar.html

i found it here : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,397390.0.html

with thanks,FrozenLord.

ok now the other problem:
i try to put commands in my server without secces

here what i tried to add:

i tried to add this command:

if(command.startsWith("home")&& playerRights >= 0){ teleportToX = 326; teleportToY = 156; addItem(126,1); sendMessage("you Are Stupid hehehe"); sendMessage("You have left to spend"); }

and this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")&& playerRights >= 0){ teleportToX = 326; teleportToY = 156; addItem(126,1); sendMessage("you Are Stupid hehehe"); sendMessage("You have left to spend"); }

server download: http://www.upload.ee/files/187434/Rune-Warfare_Server_Source.rar.html

found it with the client ^^

i hope some one will help me

with thanks,FrozenLord.

Read full topic
